title: Hospital Management System (SQL)
summary: SQL and database project modeling a hospital management system. Covers clinical-style data: patients, doctors, appointments, billing, with normalized schema and integrity constraints.
process: Designed relational schema for patients, doctors, appointments, billing
Implemented constraints, keys, and referential integrity
Created queries and structures suitable for reporting and audit
impact: Demonstrates SQL and data modeling for healthcare/operational systems
Relevant to clinical data and EMR-adjacent roles
